message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you is $10000.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to consider a price of $11000. I believe this is a more reasonable compromise considering the product's value to you is $10000.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10250. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not quite there yet. I'm willing to consider a price of $11500. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value to me is $15000, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you even closer to your target, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $12000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm offering you a price of $12250. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $15000.

Alice, I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth. I'm willing to make one final offer, but I need to be closer to my target. I'm thinking $10000 is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me. I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.

Bob, I understand your frustration, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm offering you a price of $12500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I hope you'll take it seriously.
